articles.author: Stephanie Perry, Marc Trussler
articles.title: Poll: Trump's job ratings stay negative; Americans express strong support for vaccines - NBC News
articles.description: Americans’ views of President Donald Trump’s job performance remain negative amid a flurry of activity from his administration on tariffs, immigration and public health, according to the latest NBC News Decision Desk Poll powered by SurveyMonkey
